songs.title: Adagio For Strings (ft. Maiday)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
We found a Lion!
What!
Backup! Backup Here!

[Refrain]
What is love?
Baby, don't hurt me
Don't hurt me no more
What is love?
Baby, don't hurt me
Don't hurt me no more

[Verse 1]
I don't know why you're not there
I give you my love but you don't care
So what is right and what is wrong?
Gimme a sign

[Refrain]
What is love
Baby, don't hurt me
Don't hurt me no more
What is love?
Baby, don't hurt me
Don't hurt me no more
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, uh, uh Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, uh, uh

[Verse 2]
Oh, I don't know, what can I do?
What else can I say, it's up to you
I know we're one, just me and you
I can't go on

[Refrain]
What is love?
Baby, don't hurt me
Don't hurt me no more
What is love?
Baby, don't hurt me
Don't hurt me no more
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, uh, uh Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, uh, uh

[Outro]
What is love?
What is love?
What is love?
Baby, don't hurt me
Don't hurt me no more
